name: Powerup Roulette
desc: A Powerup Roulette sprite that alternates between a Poison Mushroom and one of a Fire Flower, a Cape Feather, or a Star.

name: Mushroom
desc: A Mushroom that turns Mario into Super Mario. If placed on the ground it stays in place, but moves away from the player otherwise.

name: Cape Feather
desc: A Feather that turns Mario into Caped Mario. If placed on the ground it stays in place, but falls and floats offscreen otherwise.

name: Fire Flower
desc: A Fire Flower that turns Mario into Fire Mario. If placed on the ground it stays in place, but falls towards the ground otherwise.

name: Poison Mushroom
desc: A Poison Mushroom that hurts Mario. If placed on the ground it stays in place, but moves towards the player otherwise.
